results.title: Single Intraosseous Simvastatin Application Induces Endothelial Progenitor Cell Mobilization and Therapeutic Angiogenesis in a Diabetic Hindlimb Ischemia Rat Model.
results.text_hl: METHODS: There are eight groups of @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ in this study: normal control; @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003922 @@@type 1 diabetes mellitus@@@ control group control without drug intervention; and @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003922 @@@type 1 diabetes mellitus@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ that randomly received intraosseous @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (0, 0.5, or 1 mg) or oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ administration (0, 20, or 400 mg).

results.title: Single Intraosseous Injection of Simvastatin Promotes Endothelial Progenitor Cell Mobilization, Neovascularization, and Wound Healing in Diabetic Rats.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: A single local intraosseous application of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ promotes wound healing in @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003922 @@@type 1 diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@.

results.title: Insulin Prevents Hypercholesterolemia by Suppressing 12alpha-Hydroxylated Bile Acids.

results.title: Lipid modulation in insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus: effect on microvascular outcomes.
results.text_hl: We initiated a 2-year, randomized, double-blinded placebo-controlled pilot trial of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@/diet vs. diet alone in @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003922 @@@Type 1 diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ without overt @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@nephropathy@@@.

results.title: [Possibilities of pharmacological hepatopathy and correction of fat metabolism violations in diabetes mellitus type 1].
results.text_hl: It was revealed that the using of HP-5 and the combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and HP-5 attenuate the order of expression of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ hepatopathia as the result of the histological study and hinder from the development of dislipidemia in rates with @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003922 @@@type 1 diabetes@@@ which is more expressed in comparison with the monotherapy by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.
